title: Organizational Units
description: Endpoints for organizational units (organizations and users)

links.title: Show (explicit)
links.description: Show the details of a specific organizational unit. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).

links.title: Show (inferred)
links.description: Show the details of a specific organizational unit. If the :organizational_unit_id parameter is a organization's or a users's ID, it responds with an organization or a user. Returns HTTP 200 (OK).
